alert.note: Alert for Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:22PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Emery and southeastern Carbon Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 521 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Sunnyside, or 24 miles southeast of Price, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sunnyside and East Carbon. This includes US Route 6 between mile markers 261 and 274. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Castle Country; San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
